innerText: Dhiratthūti dhi atthu, nindā bhavatūti attho, garahāma taṃ mayanti vuttaṃ hoti. Laddhalābhoti dhanalābhaṃ yasalābhañca sandhāya vadati. Vinipātanahetunāti vinipātanassa hetubhāvena. Vutti nāma hotīti yathāvutto duvidhopi lābho apāyasaṃvattanikatāya samparāye vinipātanahetubhāvena pavattanato sampati adhammacaraṇena pavattanato ca vutti nāma hotīti attho. Evarūpā yā vuttīti evarūpā dhanalābhayasalābhasaṅkhātā yā vutti. Adhammacaraṇena vāti vā-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tvanti upayogatthe paccattavacanaṃ, taṃ icceva vā pāṭho. Asmāti pāsāṇādhivacanametaṃ.

children: yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṭṭhāneyeva dassayissāma.
innerText: Adhikaraṇasamathesu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṭṭhāneyeva dassayissāma.
